item.title: Istio is a long wild river: how to navigate it safely
item.description: At Mercari, we have few hundreds of services running in Kubernetes. We spent the last year and a half trying to integrate Istio in our microservices infrastructure at scale, with many trial-and-error and lessons learned. This presentation will explain what is making Istio a long wild river and how we managed to navigate it. It will focus on several aspects: Stabilizing Istio Adopting Istio Running Istio By sharing our learnings, we hope to make Istio a long quiet river for the community.
